QuestData.Title: An Opportunistic Approach
QuestData.Description:
The Shikaar have formed an offensive line against the Nokhud to the north. While I do not like stooping to scavenging, it is unfortunately a necessary evil for our supplies. Brave the battlefield and return with weapons, and I will reward your efforts.
If you could focus said efforts on the Nokhud side of the line, perhaps the ancestors will judge me less harshly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve weapons and slay Nokhud forces at the Nokhud Approach.
QuestData.RewardText: Ancestors forgive me. If I were stronger, we would not need to resort to such a questionable method for resources.
